bug.author: mihahauke
bug.summary: Spectator mode + PrintScreen interfere with other buttons
bug.description: When I press print screen while unclicking other buttons (arrows, wsad, ctrl etc) the unclicking is ignored. I don't know if it interferes with other buttons than printscreen.

comments.comment: Do You think it is a ViZDoom's bug? I can't replicate it and I think that it's rather related with fact that when You press printscreen, ViZDoom window is loosing focus.
I don't think it is related to the engine, rather to SDL, xserver, gui environment - closing.
